item.title: Automate CentOS 6 deployments with CIS Security Benchmarks already applied
item.description: A coworker heard me grumbling about Linux system administration standards and recommended that I review the CIS Security Benchmarks.

item.title: Installing Fedora 16 in XenServer
item.description: Getting Fedora 16 working in XenServer isn’t the easiest thing to do, but I’ve put together a repository on GitHub that should help.
